name: Magic Piano Academy
description:
Magic Piano Academy is a magic music box to learn and play musical instruments and explore different funny sounds. Turn your phone or tablet into a piano, drum set, saxophone, trumpet, flute or electric guitar. And use the fingers to make awesome music.

It's easy to learn to play musical instruments for free with Musical Game through fun games with colorful interfaces. Beside, Learn Piano Games not only helps improve their skills in music, but also helps develop memory, concentration, imagination and creativity.

FEATURES:
- There are many instruments like: Piano, xylophone, acoustic guitar, saxophone, drums, flute
- Sounds of real instruments and high quality
- 45 famous songs to learn to play.
- Auto Play Mode to play the selected song.
- Eye-catching animations
- Learning through play: alphabets, flags...

Musical Instruments Game has 4 modes: Instruments, Songs, Sounds and Play

If you love Magic Piano Academy. Do not hesitate rate and leave your review for us
